alert.note: Alert for Northern Washoe County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 11 at 3:06PM PST until December 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches possible. Winds could periodically gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Surprise Valley California and Northern Washoe County. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Secure holiday decorations to prevent them from blowing away.
info.instruction: Now is the time to prepare an emergency kit for your home and car. If traveling consider alternate plans, remember to carry tire chains, extra food, water and clothing. Once the storm arrives, travel may be difficult or impossible for an extended period of time.
